00057 inline vhdVector3& vhdVector3::operator = ( const vhdVector3& rkVector )
00058 {
00059         x = rkVector.x;
00060         y = rkVector.y;
00061         z = rkVector.z;            
00062 
00063         return *this;
00064 }
00065 
00066 inline bool vhdVector3::operator == ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const
00067 {
00068         return ( x == rkVector.x && y == rkVector.y && z == rkVector.z );
00069 }
00070 
00071 inline bool vhdVector3::operator != ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const
00072 {
00073         return ( x != rkVector.x || y != rkVector.y || z != rkVector.z );
00074 }

00076 // arithmetic operations
00077 inline vhdVector3 vhdVector3::operator + ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const
00078 {
00079         vhdVector3 kSum;
00080 
00081         kSum.x = x + rkVector.x;
00082         kSum.y = y + rkVector.y;
00083         kSum.z = z + rkVector.z;
00084 
00085         return kSum;
00086 }

00088 inline vhdVector3 vhdVector3::operator - ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const
00089 {
00090         vhdVector3 kDiff;
00091 
00092         kDiff.x = x - rkVector.x;
00093         kDiff.y = y - rkVector.y;
00094         kDiff.z = z - rkVector.z;
00095 
00096         return kDiff;
00097 }

00100 {

00102

00121 inline vhdVector3 vhdVector3::operator / ( vhtReal fScalar ) const
00122 {
00123         vhdVector3 kDiv;
00124 
00125         vhtReal fInv = 1.0 / fScalar;
00126         kDiv.x = x * fInv;
00127         kDiv.y = y * fInv;
00128         kDiv.z = z * fInv;
00129 
00130         return kDiv;
